title: Jasper Philipsen wins Kuurne-Brussel-Kuurne in Huge Bunch Sprint
content:
Belgian Philipsen triumphs on his birthday, denying Kooij and Hofsetter and showing fine form before defense of his Milan-San Remo title.

Read the full article at Jasper Philipsen wins Kuurne-Brussel-Kuurne in Huge Bunch Sprint on Velo.
author: sstokes
